item.author: Author
item.description: USS - OMVS command This characters bracket characters [] and others that don’t convert to a readable form was driving me crazy. enter this command when starting a USS session: omvs convert((BPXFX111)) Example, in man pages converts this line: pax Ý-cdEnvz¨Ý-H|-L¨Ý-f archive¨ Ý-o type¨ Ý-s substitute¨ … Ýpattern …¨ to this line: pax [-cdEnvz][-H|-L][-f archive] [-o type] [-s substitute] … [pattern …] much easier to read. 👍 OMVS Display command Another command option for readability, while in ishell:
